alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Montgomery and north central Harris Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hooks Airport, or near Tomball, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tomball, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Shenandoah, Stagecoach, The Woodlands Pavillion and Hooks Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
